name: Carocci, Appellant, v. Piccone et ux.

parties: Carocci, Appellant, v. Piccone et ux.

Per Curiam,
The order of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Flood.

casebody.head_matter:
Carocci, Appellant, v. Piccone et ux.
Argued November 11, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Samuel I. Sacks, with him Isadore Gottlieb, for appellant.
Edward Unterberger, for appellees.
January 3, 1949:
